text: Survivor Series (1990) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on on November 22, 1990 (Thanksgiving Day) at the Hartford Civic Center in Hartford, Connecticut. It was the fourth Survivor Series event held by the WWF. The event is best known for featuring the debut of The Undertaker.Ted DiBiase: The Million Dollar Man, p.177, Ted DiBiase with Tom Caiazzo, Pocket Books, New York, 2008, ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Shane Douglas defeated Buddy Rose Singles match N/A 2 The Warriors (The Ultimate Warrior, The Legion of Doom (Hawk and Animal), and The Texas Tornado) defeated The Perfect Team (Mr. Perfect and Demolition (Ax, Smash, and Crush)) (with Bobby Heenan and Mr. Fuji) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 14:20 3 The Million Dollar Team (Ted DiBiase, The Undertaker, and Rhythm & Blues (The Honky Tonk Man and Greg Valentine)) (with Virgil, Jimmy Hart, and Brother Love) defeated The Dream Team (Dusty Rhodes, Koko B. Ware, and The Hart Foundation (Bret Hart and Jim Neidhart)) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 13:54 4 The Visionaries (Rick Martel, The Warlord, Power and Glory (Hercules and Paul Roma)) (with Slick) defeated The Vipers (Jake Roberts, Jimmy Snuka, and The Rockers (Shawn Michaels and Marty Jannetty)) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 17:42 5 The Hulkamaniacs (Hulk Hogan, Jim Duggan, Big Boss Man, and Tugboat) defeated The Natural Disasters (Earthquake, Haku, Dino Bravo, and The Barbarian) (with Jimmy Hart and Bobby Heenan) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 14:49 6 The Alliance (Nikolai Volkoff, Tito Santana, and The Bushwhackers (Luke and Butch) defeated The Mercenaries (Sgt. Slaughter, Boris Zhukov and The Orient Express (Sato and Tanaka) (with Mr. Fuji and General Adnan) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 10:52 7 Hulk Hogan, The Ultimate Warrior, and Tito Santana defeated Ted DiBiase, Rick Martel, The Warlord and Power and Glory (Hercules and Paul Roma) (with Virgil and Slick) "Grand Finale Match of Survival": three-on-five Survivor Series elimination match which featured the survivors from the earlier matches 9:07 === Eliminations === Eliminated Wrestler Eliminated by Method Time Ax The Ultimate Warrior Pinfall 3:23 Smash N/A Disqualification 7:36 Crush Hawk Animal 6 The Texas Tornado Mr. Perfect Pinfall 11:02 7 Mr. Perfect The Ultimate Warrior 14:20 The Ultimate Warrior Eliminated Wrestler Eliminated by Method Time Koko B.
